item.title: PI High Scores
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

How are you populating your arrays? I think this check [i]ranks > 0 is causing your issues. Make sure you populate the array properly.

Read full topic

item.title: PI High Scores
item.dc:creator: @JoesServers JoesServers
item.description:
@JoesServers wrote:

Hello, How can i fix this so it shows everyone ingame, Not just one name.

getPA().sendFrame126(“Close Window”, 6401);
getPA().sendFrame126(" “, 6402);
getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 6403);

And

[code=java] public void highscores() {
getPA().sendFrame126(“RunePwn HighScores”, 6399);
for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
if(ranks[i] > 0) {
getPA().sendFrame126("Rank “+(i+1)+”: "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6402+i);
}
}
getPA().showInterface(6308);
flushOutStream();
resetRanks();
}
public int playerRank = 0;
public static int[] ranks = new int[11];
public static String[] rankPpl = new String[11];

[/code]

All it shows on the Scoreboard is the following:

[b]Please tell me how i can fix this
